Package com.crs.controller

Class CarRentalController

java.lang.Object
com.crs.controller.CarRentalController
public class CarRentalController extends Object
Controller class for managing car rental operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor to initialize the car lease repository.

    • createLease

      public Lease createLease(int customerID, int carID, Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Creates a new lease in the system.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer leasing the car.
      carID - The ID of the leased car.
      startDate - The start date of the lease.
      endDate - The end date of the lease.
      Returns:
      The created lease.

      Returns:
